title: Putin, Still Harboring Assad, Welcomes New Syrian Leader to Moscow Again
summary_full: This is the second time that President Vladimir V. Putin has hosted President Ahmed al-Sharaa since the fall of the Russia-backed Syrian dictator Bashar al-Assad.
summary_public: This is the second time that President Vladimir V. Putin has hosted President Ahmed al-Sharaa since the fall of the Russia-backed Syrian dictator Bashar al-Assad.

SY.label: neutral
SY.evidence: welcomes New Syrian Leader to Moscow Again
